plugins.name: ARP Manager
plugins.description: View and manage ARP cache entries on the local system
plugins.author: NetScout-Go Team

plugins.name: BLE HTTP Proxy
plugins.description: Allows phones and PCs to connect to the dashboard via Bluetooth Low Energy
plugins.author: NetScout-Go Team

plugins.name: DNS Lookup
plugins.description: Performs DNS lookups for a domain
plugins.author: NetScout-Go Team

plugins.name: DNS Propagation Checker
plugins.description: Checks DNS propagation of a domain across multiple DNS servers worldwide
plugins.author: NetScout-Go Team

plugins.name: Network Information
plugins.description: Displays detailed information about the device's network connections
plugins.author: NetScout-Go Team

plugins.name: Network Latency Heatmap
plugins.description: Creates a visual heatmap of network latency across multiple destinations
plugins.author: NetScout-Go Team

plugins.name: Ping
plugins.description: Tests connectivity to a host by sending ICMP echo requests
plugins.author: NetScout-Go Team

plugins.name: Traceroute
plugins.description: Traces the route packets take to a network host
plugins.author: NetScout-Go Team
